RHealth: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling

Source: R/RHealth-package.R
RHealth-package.Rd

RHealth is an open-source R package specifically designed to bring comprehensive deep learning toolkits to the R community for healthcare predictive modeling.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://v1xerunt.github.io/dev/RHealth

  • https://github.com/v1xerunt/RHealth

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/v1xerunt/RHealth/issues
